messages.subject: unschooling phrases
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/20/02 12:32:52 PM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/20/02 12:32:52 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Besides which, a lot of the people we might like to convince are totally
turned off by school-bashing. I know my husband was. His school
experiences were mostly positive, so he didn't want to hear how bad schools
are. What he wanted to hear were the positives about
homeschooling/unschooling. That's what he got from me, and now he's
totally in support.
>>

Same here Tia. My dh gets very irritated at any school bashing since he also
had a good school experience and feels that it's fine for some people.
He supports homeschooling, but still disagrees with unschooling and yet does
not want to thwart us in any way. Bashing schools won't help him become more
supportive of unschooling in any way.

Ren
